Posts.Content: Sep 5, 2015 04:44AM Maryanne_A wrote: Thank you so much Hopeful and Flower. This  site really helps when I'm feeling  that I'm the only one going through this. I don't know anyone with breast cancer, my sister died of colon cancer, my mom of pancreatic cancer.  The last thing I was expecting was this. Flower I'm very sorry about recent diagnoses. Hugs and prayers to you both.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed Maryanne_A Moderators

Posts.Content: Maryanne_A wrote: I had my biopsy 3 days ago on my left breast and one lymph node, the following days my doctor called me. Invasive ductal carcinoma, my head is spinning with all the information I need to know. Next up is a MRI next Monday (which seems like a lifetime away) then back to doctor to decide on  the the type of surgery is right for me. I feel like my life has stopped and I'm living someone else's life right now. Dx 9/2/2015, IDC, Left, 4cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 3/27 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed Maryanne_A Moderators
